title: Dr. Rita Hocog Inos Territorial Fellowship Act
content: Dr. Rita Hocog Inos Territorial Fellowship Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Dr. Rita Hocog Inos Fellowship Program to award local government and federal government fellowships to qualified students from American Samoa, the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands, Guam, or the US Virgin Islands. Allows a fellow to receive either a specified stipend or academic credit toward graduation for participating in an internship. Defines a quot, qualified studentquot. As a student who is a US citizen, domiciled in American Samoa, the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands, Guam, or the US Virgin Islands, and enrolled in a degree or certificate program at an institution of higher education.
